title: Gameplay Guide
description: Basic gameplay methods and rules for awaputi

content.overview: awaputi is an action game where you pop bubbles appearing on screen to achieve high scores.
content.objective: The goal is to pop as many bubbles as possible within the time limit to achieve a high score.
basic_rules: Bubbles will burst naturally over time and deal damage to your HP
Popping bubbles consecutively creates combos and gives score bonuses
Special bubbles have different unique effects
